subject: Tennis
organizations: United States Mens Clay Court Championships
lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt held on to win his first tournament in two years with a 6-2, 7-5 victory over Wayne Odesnik at the United States Men’s Clay Court Championships in Houston. Hewitt won his 498th career match and moved closer to joining Roger Federer and Carlos Moyá as the only active players with 500 or more victories. Hewitt also won his first clay-court tournament since he took the Delray Beach tournament in 1999.
